owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment: The Corago Semantic Model is an extension of CIDOC CRM and FRBRoo (both Erlangen version) dedicated to the domain of Opera. This implementation has been developed by Paolo Bonora and Angelo Pompilio at the Department of Cultural Heritage of University of Bologna. The Corago SM is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs 3.0 Unported (CC BY-NC-ND 3.0) License.
owl:Ontology.rdfs:label: Corago Semantic Model (Corago SM)

owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:comment: Defines the typing class of a navigable property
Definisce la classe che qualifica una proprietà navigabile
owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:label: Classe caratterizzante
Typing class

owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:comment: posizione della classe qualificate la proprietà navigabile nella property chain
specifies the position of the qualifying class in the property path
owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:label: Posizione della classe caratterizzante
Typing class position

owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:comment: Defines the thematic area of a navigable property. Value range: basic_info, performance, characters, contents, structure, sources, bibliography, relations.
Definisce l'area tematica delle navigable properties. Valori ammessi: basic_info, performance, characters, contents, structure, sources, bibliography, relations.
Identifies those navigation properties that are key features of the resource and enable the user to identify it.
owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:label: Specifica se la proprietà rientra tra quelle che specificano l’identità della risorsa
is a key feature

rdfs:Datatype.rdfs:comment: The Corago date format is in reverse format YYYY/MM/DD. When the precision is missing the relative digits are omitted (i.e. 1472/01 means that no information about the day is available).
rdfs:Datatype.rdfs:label: Corago reverse date format

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Associa una frase oggetto di analisi NLP al rispettivo personaggio
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: riferita al personaggio

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Attesta la responsabilità di un Actor in base ad una fonte
Documents the source of an Actor role
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: CP10 documented in

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Place where the work has been performed first
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: CP11 first performance place

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Location where the work has been performed first
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: CP12 first performance location

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Data di composizione di una opera
Date of conception of a work
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: CP14 Conception date

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies a navigable URL for a resource.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: CP15 has URL

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Specifies the most specific title of a book as stated within the source
Scope note: This property defines the relation between an E7 Activity and a C2 Actor Role which is the role an E39 Actor has carried it out with.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: CP2 carried out role

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Scope note: This property defines the relation between a C2 Actor Role for a specific E7 Activity and the E39 Actor who has carried it out.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: CP3 carried out actor

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Represent a direct (untyped) relation between two entity. Equivalent to P67 refers to, could be inferred by the property chain: CP5 refers with o CP6 refers to.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: CP4 links

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates the domain range entity with the instance of C5 Link which specifies the nature of the relation occuring with the target entity it is refferring to through CP6 refers to.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: CP5 refers with

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates the C5 Link which specifies the nature of the relation occuring with the range entity it is refferring to.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: CP6 refers to

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates the C2 Actor Role with the part performet by the actor in the role.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: CP7 performed part

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Specifies the Character performed with the Actor Role.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: CP8 performed character

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Identifica la prima rappresentazione di un opera
Identifies the first performance of a work
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: CP9 first performed in

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Abstract ancestor of searchable Corago properties.
Proprietà astratta ancestor delle proprietà utilizzabili per la ricerca.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: ricercabile
searchable

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Ancestor property of all navigable Data Properties
Proprietà astratta che identifica le property chain adibite alla navigazione delle entità Corago
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: navigabile
navigable

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Proprietà astratta che descrive le proprietà che permettono di georeferenziare le entità
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: georeferenceable
georeferenziabile

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Abstract property that defines properties used for resources full text indexing.
Proprietà astratta che identifica le proprietà utili all'indicizzazione full text delle risorse.
Identifica l'insieme di proprietà "breadcrumbs" utilizzate per indicizzare il full text della risorsa.
Identifies the breadcrumb properties set used as full text index for the given entity.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Full text index
Indice full text

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Analytical index for the give resource.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Analytical indexed by
Indice analitico di

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Abstract property that defines those properties that describe the analytical features used to index a resource.
Proprietà astratta che definisce le proprietà utilizzate per indicizzare in termini analitici le risorse.
Dramatic figure linked to a character of the work.
Figura drammatica associata ad un personaggio dell'opera.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Figura drammatica
Work's dramatic figure

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Place where the event took place
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: luogo
place

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Location where the event took place
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: location
sede

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Description of a character in a work
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Character description
Qualifica del personaggio

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Defines a relationship between to entities.
Documenta o attesta una relazione tra entità.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: fa riferimento a
refers to

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Defines the authorship of a work.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: concepita da
concepted by

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: data di prima rappresentazione di un opera
specifies the date of the first performance of a work
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: first performance
prima rappresentazione

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Identifica il luogo in cui un opera è stata messa in scena.
Identifies the place where a work has been perfomred at.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: messo in scena a
performed at

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Identifies the performances where a work has been performed in.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: performed in
rappresentata in

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Identifies the relation between a work and its characters.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: contiene il personaggio
has character

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Identifica l'attore che interpreta il personaggio.
Identifies the actor acting a role.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: interpretato da
played by

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Identifica il luogo in cui un attore ha interpretato un ruolo.
Indentifies the place where an actor has performed a role.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: interpretato a
played at

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Place where a work as been performance first
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: first performace place
luogo prima rappresentazione

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Theatre where a work has been performed first
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: first performance location
sede prima rappresentazione

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Date of first performance of a work
Date of the first performance of a work
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: data prima rapresentazione
first performance date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Autor of the bibliographic reference reported by the source
Represents the title as reported by the source
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: document title in source
titolo proprio

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: URL of the digital reproduction of the resource
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: CDP12 has digital reproduction

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Represents the location of the referred entity in the lat-lon format ( http://www.bigdata.com/rdf/geospatial/literals/v1#lat-lon) required to perform geospatial query. Example: "48.13743#11.57549"^^<http://www.bigdata.com/rdf/geospatial/literals/v1#lat-lon>
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: CDP13 location

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Represent the point in space and time when the referred entity occurred expressed in the lat-lon-time format (http://www.bigdata.com/rdf/geospatial/literals/v1#lat-lon-time). Example: "48.13188#11.54965#1379714400"^^<http://www.bigdata.com/rdf/geospatial/literals/v1#lat-lon-time>
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: CDP14 happened

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Location derived from the scene setting of a work
Location derived from a description of a work or a character setting of a work
Location derived from a performance
Specifies if the literary text used in the libretto is original
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: CDP18 is literary text original

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Specifies if the literary text of the libretto is original or a reprise or a variation of
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: literary text originality
tipo testo letterario

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Specifica il genere di un opera così come riportato dalla fonte
Specifies the genre of a work as stated within the source
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: genere in fonte
genre in source of a work

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: If true, the Actor Role is uncertain attribuited to the Actor (the relative label has to be marked with a "?")
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: CDP2 is uncertain attribution

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: True when the attribution has been made upon a secondary or complementary source
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: CDP3 is secondary source attribution

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Identifies the primary authorship role
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: CDP4 is primary

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indentifies the ordinal position of the performance in a Season events sequence
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: CDP5 season sequence order

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The title of the performance as reported by the source (primary or secondary)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: CDP6 performance title in source

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Editorial number of a document
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: editorial number
num. editoriale

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Riporta l'edizione del documento così come indicata nella fonte
Specifies the edition of a document as stated within the source
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: edition in source
edizione in fonte

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The title of the work as reported by the source (primary or secondary)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: CDP9 work title in source

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Describes the scene setting of the work
owl:Class.rdfs:label: C10 Scene Setting

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Describes the chorus characteristics, its role or part in the work and composition
owl:Class.rdfs:label: C11 Chorus Description

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Defines the production type
owl:Class.rdfs:label: C12 Production Type

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Describes the kind of the occasion beyng celebrated with the Performance
owl:Class.rdfs:label: C13 Occasion Type

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Describes the type or kind of the event being performed
owl:Class.rdfs:label: C14 Event Type

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Defines the type of edition of a document (i.e. first edition, reprint, etc.)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: C15 Edition Type

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Represents the best approximate definition available for a Time Span
owl:Class.rdfs:label: C16 Approximate Time Appellation

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This class represent a desctiption of a character's atomic feature as derived from the character's description found in sources. It may represent both physical or abstract characteristic of the related character.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: C17 character feature

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This class defines a role of authorship carried out by an Actor such as work's conception, expression creation but not role acting.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: C18 Author Role

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This class defines a direct reference between two E31_Document instances. It is used to refer to a bibliographic reference.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: C19 Bibliographic Reference

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Abstract ancestor class
owl:Class.rdfs:label: C1 Type

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This class define a generic contribution role of the Actor differing from authorship or performing
owl:Class.rdfs:label: C20 Contributor Role

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Identifies a Period of time in a year while a set of events are performed
owl:Class.rdfs:label: C15 Season

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Figura rappresentativa di uno o più personaggi omologhi, ovvero sovrapponibili in termini di caratteristiche e ruolo svolto nelle rispettive azioni drammatiche, che compaiono in opere diverse.
Representative figure of one or more homologous characters, that is superimposable in terms of characteristics and role played in their respective dramatic actions appearing in different works.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Dramatic figure
Figura drammatica

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A set of attributes characterizing a type of dramatic figure
Insieme di attributi caratterizzanti un tipo di figura drammatica.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Archetipo
Archetype

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A subject with its own identity and a space-time collocation that is represented in moments of its existence or with attributes different from one or more dramatic figures that are referred to as a unique and autonomous entity.

Soggetto dotato di una propria identità e collocazione spazio-temporale precisa che viene rappresentato in momenti della propria esistenza o con attributi diversi da una o più figure drammatiche che risultano far riferimento ad esso come entità unica ed autonoma.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Identità narrativa
Narrative identity

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Historically attested actor or entity to which a narrative identity or an archetype refers.
Soggetto o entità attestata storicamente cui una identità narrativa o un archetipo fanno riferimento.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Historical figure
Personaggio storico

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Rappresenta una espressione in linguaggio naturale
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Frase
Sentence

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A Part Of Speech token
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Parola
Token

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A morphosyntactic annotation resulting from a NLP analysis of a text
Annotazione morfosintattica risultato di una analisi NLP del testo.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Annotazione morfosintattica
Morphosyntactic annotation

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Defines or specifies the role that an Actor has had in a specific Activity. Should be used with CP2 and CP3 in order to link an E7_Activity to its E39_Actor with a specific Role. Could be considered the logn path of P14_carried_out_by.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: C2 Actor Role

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Defines the Genre of the E1_CRM_Entity.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: C3 Genre

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Defines the Codified Genre of the E1_CRM_Entity.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: C4 Codified Genre

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Defines the type of link between F1_Work or F2_Expression.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: C5 Link

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Defines or specifies the role with a Character or Performance has to be performed with.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: C6 Performer Role

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Defines the kind of part taken by the character in the Performance.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: C7 Character Part

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Describes the stereotiped kind of Character.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: C8 Character Type

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Defines the kind of production release in order of its public presentation as premiere or a reprise.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: C9 Production Release

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Relevance of the attribute among the resource's metadata.
Rilevanza dell'attributo nella descrizione della risorsa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: priority
priorità
